workflow.title: Data Flow
workflow.subtitle: How Does It Work?
workflow.description: The system ensures complete security while enabling transparent tracking of every transaction and interest settlement.

step1.title: Data Ingestion
step1.description: User uploads CSV file via API (Shopify/Stripe). The ledger fetches historical transactions via machine (Client-side).

step2.title: Anomaly Check
step2.description: Benford algorithm runs locally to evaluate fraud scores. If score exceeds ≥ threshold (Threshold), decision is sent.

step3.title: ZK Proving
step3.description: Create Growth Proof locally: "Verified that Sales ≥ $X and Benford Score passes K%" without revealing internal numbers.

step4.title: On-Chain Settlement
step4.description: Smart Contract validates proof. If valid, grant credit access (Credit Limit) updated and calculate interest rate (USDC).
